thread.title: Computers Are Showing Their Biases, and Tech Firms Are Concerned
thread.title_full: Computers Are Showing Their Biases, and Tech Firms Are Concerned - WSJ

author: Elizabeth Dwoskin
title: Computers Are Showing Their Biases, and Tech Firms Are Concerned
text:
Software tags our photos, recommends products to buy online and serves up ads based on our interests. Increasingly, it also plays a role in more consequential decisions, such as who gets a job, a loan, or pays surge pricing in a ride-sharing app.
But computer programs that crunch immense amounts of data to render decisions or predictions can go embarrassingly, sometimes troublingly wrong.
In May, Flickr, a division of Yahoo...
